alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 1:44PM CST until January 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. portions of central and west central Missouri. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from Midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear layered clothing, a hat, and gloves.
